title: The Kona Libre CR Wants to Be Your Next Racey Gravel Bike
content:
The Kona Libre CR gravel bike got a complete overhaul, keeping its simple guided brake hoses and durability while going for faster look and feel.

Read the full article at The Kona Libre CR Wants to Be Your Next Racey Gravel Bike on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
